Successful authentication using legitima.Action: Collect successful login events (Windows Event ID 4624, Zeek conn.log, VPN logs). Filter for external source IPs. Compare source IPs and login times against historical data for each user/account. Identify users with successful logins from previously unseen IPs or at times statistically outside their normal behavior (e.g., using time series analysis or correlation with geographic data). Prioritize accounts with high privileges.

Discovery or use of unauthorized remote.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 5156, Zeek http.log, Zeek conn.log
Discovery or use of unauthorized remote.Action: Monitor process creation events (Windows Event ID 4688) and network connection events (Windows Event ID 5156, Zeek conn.log) on public-facing servers and endpoints. Search for processes or network connections associated with known web shell names/hashes or communication patterns indicative of unauthorized remote access tools. Analyze entropy or frequency distribution of accessed URLs/parameters in Zeek http.log on web servers to detect anomalous patterns indicative of web shell activity.
